name: Physics Ball Simulator
description:
IMPROVE YOUR THINKING SKILLS WITH THIS INNOVATIVE PHYSICS PUZZLE GAME!

Physics Ball Simulator is a kind of labyrinth game where you position objects to get the ball to the goal. It's based on a physical simulator. With this game you will train your logical thinking skills.

Features:
● The game is based on a real physical simulator, which computes forces and friction in real-time.
● 40 unique levels with more to come.
● 60 fps.
● 3D effects.

Try this game today!
